participant_abstract.sent: We mostly discussed the design and how it will look and work.
We came to decisions on the interface and function of the design.

participant_actions.sent: ID and UID will design a prototype model.

participant_decisions.sent: small - no base. batteries- looking into lithium.
Hard base of plastic, latex cover to go with current trends - replaceable.
button on the left and right sides control channel and volume.
bottom section always shows through yellow with RR logo.
distinctive shape and location of buttons to be used by feel.

participant_problems.sent: One more thing to decide: lithium batteries?
